title: Kinderfänger
overview: When vulnerable kids start going missing, Olivia, a hard of hearing/deaf care worker with a troubled past, goes searching - only to find herself in a battle with the Kinderfänger; a mythical creature who will stop at nothing to keep the children he's stolen.  Kinderfänger follows a deaf teacher who discovers she may hold the key to finding an ancient evil force that is assembling an army of troubled souls.
